resources.string: Click me to turn my services on!
Click me to turn my services off!
Choose your profile mode you want!
Select all account events which I should monitor

Ever had your phone ring loudly in the middle of a meeting or a movie? 

 Profile Chameleon saves you a ton of embarrassment by turning your phone silent automagically when there is an event in progress! 

 - Need only your work account to be monitored? 

 Profile Chameleon gives you the flexibility to choose only the accounts which it should monitor!
